Le di muchas oportunidades y no me termina de convencer, es un buen juego pero no es de mi agrado.

me parece un juego muy genial por que tras de que puedes ser un asesino o un superviviente te da la opcion de escoger varios personajes por los lados del asesino tiene variedad de personajes es muy genial, sigan sacando mas personajes para supervivientes.
at first it was kinda nooying but really getting addicted to the game now.

Good but pretty buggy has been better recently though. Much better than the game near launch.
Крутая графика,очень хорошо играть с друзьями.Да рекомендую

Отличная игра с весьма уникальной механикой,интересный сеттинг,неплохая атмосфера,но со временем,которая перестаёт играть свою роль,люди,готовые пойти на многое,чтобы спасти тебя от неминуемой смерти,но у этой игры есть одна большая проблема-это само её комьюнити,когда играешь за мана,часты случаи,когда тебя просто так называют  "кемпером" или "читером",обвиняют тебя в спидхаке,мапхаке,просто потому что ты хорошо играешь или т.к ты бежишь за сурвом,который мансит вокруг крюка,хорошо,что разработчики фиксят баги,слушают мнения комьюнити,периодически радуют нас новыми обновлениями,надеюсь они будут продолжать в том же духе,но людям в игре тоже нужно становиться лучше,чтобы всем было приятнее играть в эту игру.
Игра крутая,но из за некоторых людей желание играть пропадает (
我还能说什么呢？好久没玩了看别人玩是真的有感觉
DbD n'est pas un jeu ou vous prendrez du plaisir à la première partie, mais vous prendrez énormément de plaisir à le maitriser.
想玩屠夫得排很久，而且经常有人加载界面就掉了，让你半小时的等待直接报废
It is fun being chased by a murderer
생존자는 재밌는데 살인마는 노랭만 가도 빨랭 매칭되서 씹노잼임

FANTASTIC! however, a warning to new players: there is a steep learning curve and a lot of grinding out bloodpoints in the begining.

If you like games with deep systems and a lot to learn as well as assymetical multiplayer games, or are a horror fan looking for an awesome exerience, this is for you. If youre looking for something a little more causal and pick up and play, maaaaybe try something else. 

That all being said: FIX THE HITBOXES AND FIX GEN SPEEDS!!!
Yes yes yes yes YES. Great game 9.7/10. .1 point off for servers. .1 point off for bugs. .1 point off because of toxicity. still a great game.

Best game ever and has something for everyone.
Super easy mode - called being any killer.  Like ridiculously easy.  
Super hard mode - being any survivor.  Good luck winning, it's almost impossible since the developers launch a new detection skill every character.  Seriously, they must hate survivors.  Survivors' only skill is to hide, so they launch a bunch of skills for killers that tell them exactly where you are.  And don't get me started on instant downs & kills...like it wasn't easy enough for the killer already.   

Despite this obvious game play difference in skill between survivor & killer.  Very fun game that is both engaging & thrilling.  And it is done all in about 15 min games!
Horrifyingly Amazing game always on the edge of my seat
Came for the concept, stayed for mechanics + progression.

Extrañamente adictivo, la comunidad o es tóxica o son buena gente, o un extremo o otro. Eso si el matchmaking como el ojete, esta muy desbalanceado y pocas veces toca gente de tu rango, o bien muy inferior o de rango mas alto. 
Lo malo es que cuesta muchísimo conseguir un personaje con la moneda del juego si no te da la gana pagar o no puedes, pero bueno, se puede si eres paciente. 
Con amigos se disfruta más la verdad, pero jugando solo también se pasa un buen rato :)

除了好玩我已经没什么可说的了。
但是鬼匹配的真的好慢啊——（落泪
以及这条评论就是我在匹配时写的（？
Best 20 dollar game I've ever bought.
游戏很难，但这游戏手感挺好，就是匹配机制有些吓人，我一个18段的萌新屠夫给我排到4段的红段人皇，我人都傻了，对新手太不友好。最近更新的角色看着挺好玩的，总体游戏玩法还是比较单一，希望越做越好吧
si quieres divertirte este es el juego que buscas pero si solo te gusta ganar mejor anda tomandotelo de otra forma
谢谢bug的优惠券，室友买完已经吓死了，我现在已经住上单人间保研了。

ESTE JUEGO ES APTO SOLO Y PURAMENTE PARA MASOQUISTAS, NO RECOMENDADO JUGAR SOLO, NERFEAN A LOS SUPERVIVIENTES PORQUE OBVIAMENTE GANAMOS MUCHO (NO GANAMOS UNA MI**DA) Y LA COMUNIDAD ES PEOR QUE LA DE LOL. EN RESUMEN SI QUIEREN TILTEARSE CASI SIEMPRE COMPRENSELO.
CON AMOR UN JUGADOR DE ESTA COSA LLAMADA VIDEOJUEGO MAL HECHA.
edit: Que no lo recomiende no significa que no sea divertido y que te de unas risas de vez en cuando jugando con amigos
edit 2: DEJEN DE PONER UPDATES QUE CAGUEN MAS EL JUEGO, ARREGLEN SU MIERDA, MENOS SKINS Y MAS COSAS Q FUNCIONEN. Con odio Yo.
Toxic community and the devs have no idea what the players want. But as their famous quote " We done a pretty good job so far".... that is all
Gostei muito do jogo porem tem uns caçadores que são meio complicado de lidar mas é muito bom jogar com os amigos e se divertir um pouco

The game is good but also very stressful at times. You can either have a lot of fun or want to smash your head against a wall. Happens with either Killer or Survivor. Hesistant reccomendation but it's definitely fun and has lots of progression once you get past the shit games and can spend the time to learn how to optimally play. Business model is not ideal but understandable as they have licenses for certain killers. The in game currency is insanely slow to get so while you can do well with just the base game, there are a lot of killers and survivor perks that aren't available without a lot of grinding.

UPDATE: It's still toxic

Es un juegazo tiene una diversidad de escenarios muy a doc de la temática de horror y una buena variedad de personajes es también un juego con roles y destreza única con cada personaje, lo recomiendo para todos los amantes del horror y suspenso 1000 !

O jogo é muito divertido, as mecanicas sao muito interessantes e é um desafio chegar nos niveis mais altos. Levei 500 horas pra conseguir level 1. se voce é fragil sobre toxicidade, fique longe. a comunidade é bem toxica, mas tem seu lado bom
o game é bom, mas se voce tem o windows 10 com o directx 12.... desista! eu joguei mt enquanto tinha o win7 agora ja era tudo.

Nunca vi um jogo online fazer eu dar tanta rage assim e aprender novos xingamentos para xingar os sobreviventes
aqueles ********* que me salvam quando o killer ta do meu lado parece que tem minhoca no cerebro
e o killer aquele ********** que parece que sente o cheiro do meu ** que sempre dá de frente comigo
Jogão recomendo com os amigos melhor ainda

I played the shit out of this game in 2017. I was obsessed. I still enjoy this game occasionally I just played it so much I got burnt out LOL. It's such a unique game even still! It gets my adrenaline going for sure. Jump scares occasionally. It's a great game with active devs always working on releasing something new for the community whether it be new killers/survivors to completely revamping the gameplay to adding new outfits/skins for your favorite characters; this game isn't going to be dead anytime soon.

This new updates has made it absolutely garbage to play. Great job making it work better for killer, but it has ruined any chance of survivors being able to gain any points or anything. It is now harder to do anything as a team by making it longer to do anything.
Great game, but has it's issues like all others. Not for new PC players, and is quite difficult.
This game s u c. k s!

Community is cancer, game doesn't work but is fucking addictive so me and my friends keep playing but we all agree if literally anyone brings out a game that's even 1% better than this one we'll uninstal this shit instantly.
Lobbies stake forever to load but fun...
it's lowkey pretty good. If you get past the glitches and bugs. My overall number 1 tip is don't take the game seriously and just try to have fun.
